title: vivo Y29 5G's price leaks
description: vivo will soon launch the Y29 series in India, and today the pricing for the 5G model has been leaked. This will allegedly be offered in no less than four different configurations: 4/128GB for INR 13,999, 6/128GB for INR 15,499, 8/128GB for INR 16,999, and 8/256GB for INR 18,999. These will be the recommended prices in the country, however, vivo will apparently offer a cashback of INR 1,000 on the 4GB version and INR 1,500 on the 8GB variants on EMI transactions. Full swipe transactions will be eligible for a cashback of up to INR 750. You'll also be able to get the phone with no-cost EMI...
excerpt: It's expected to launch soon. vivo will soon launch the Y29 series in India, and today the pricing for the 5G model has been leaked. This will allegedly be...
text: vivo will soon launch the Y29 series in India, and today the pricing for the 5G model has been leaked. This will allegedly be offered in no less than four different configurations: 4/128GB for INR 13,999, 6/128GB for INR 15,499, 8/128GB for INR 16,999, and 8/256GB for INR 18,999. These will be the recommended prices in the country, however, vivo will apparently offer a cashback of INR 1,000 on the 4GB version and INR 1,500 on the 8GB variants on EMI transactions. Full swipe transactions will be eligible for a cashback of up to INR 750. You'll also be able to get the phone with no-cost EMI for up to six months. According to a previous leak, the Y29 5G will have a 6.68-inch screen, the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC at the helm, and a 5,500 mAh battery with support for 44W fast wired charging. The phone is said to come in Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black. It will have a 50 MP main camera with a 0.08 MP secondary decorative camera, an 8 MP selfie snapper, as well as IP64 dust and splash resistance. It will be 8.1mm thick and will weigh 198g. Source
html:
vivo will soon launch the Y29 series in India, and today the pricing for the 5G model has been leaked. This will allegedly be offered in no less than four different configurations: 4/128GB for INR 13,999, 6/128GB for INR 15,499, 8/128GB for INR 16,999, and 8/256GB for INR 18,999.

These will be the recommended prices in the country, however, vivo will apparently offer a cashback of INR 1,000 on the 4GB version and INR 1,500 on the 8GB variants on EMI transactions. Full swipe transactions will be eligible for a cashback of up to INR 750. You'll also be able to get the phone with no-cost EMI for up to six months.

According to a previous leak, the Y29 5G will have a 6.68-inch screen, the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC at the helm, and a 5,500 mAh battery with support for 44W fast wired charging.

The phone is said to come in Glacier Blue, Titanium Gold, and Diamond Black. It will have a 50 MP main camera with a 0.08 MP secondary decorative camera, an 8 MP selfie snapper, as well as IP64 dust and splash resistance. It will be 8.1mm thick and will weigh 198g.

Source
